title: What is Redmi Note 4 SAR value? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every phone has a SAR value.Redmi has a SAR value = 0.464 w/kg. United States: the FCC requires that phones sold have a SAR level at or below 1.6 watts per kilogram (W/kg) taken over the volume containing a mass of 1 gram of tissue that is absorbing the most signal.

The SAR value 1g limit prescribed in India is 1.6W/kg. The SAR Head value for Redmi 4 is .750W/kg for head and .812W/kg for body *at a distance of 15mm. Therefore Xiaomi wants you to keep a distance of 1.5cm between your head and the device - and, not press it to your headside - like we normally do.
